attributes.action: Stop Harriet Harman from making 'Positive Discrimination' in favour of Women and Ethnic Minorities Law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should it be legal to discriminate in favour of female or ethnic candidates?

Surely, all discrimination is wrong - this law would simply make discrimination legal when applying for a position and the success of that application should only be based on ability.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
